name: ent-isokaurene,[reduced NADPH---hemoprotein reductase]:oxygen oxidoreductase
definition: ent-2alpha-Hydroxyisokaurene + Oxygen + [Reduced NADPH---hemoprotein reductase] <=> ent-2alpha,3alpha-Dihydroxyisokaurene + H2O + [Oxidized NADPH---hemoprotein reductase]
comment: the second step of two-step reaction (see R12058, R09861+R11978)
